I hate this goddamn game. 
I hate it. 
I play it EXCLUSIVELY for the benefit of two people on my friends list. 
That's it. 
Things are broken? Who cares! They've got your money, what do they care the fuckin' thing works or not? 
E.G. Easy anti cheat doesn't work on this game, go ahead, go to aimjunkies or wherever and get an engine. 
They aren't going to stop you! They have no incentive to! 
Ghostface T posing inna air while moving at 200mph and throwing hatchets like a CIWS, btw
Game's balanced around the hardcore players, I get that, but its like... damn. 
Killers can hit behind them in a 270 degree radius, btw 
Killers don't have to be facing you to down you, btw 
Killers can move up to 250% of your max speed, btw 
Killers can see you at all times, btw 
Killers can almost instantly regress all gens 25% from wherever they're standing, btw 
Killers can make you reveal your location any time of their choosing, btw 
Killers can literally teleport to you, btw 
Killers can one shot you at almost all times, btw 
Killers can block gens for five minutes at a time, btw 
Killers can block exit gate for ten got damn minutes at a time, btw 
But we can hide in a closet, SOMETIMES, so that's good...
How much easier do killers need it? 
HOW MUCH? 
DURR DUH WICH BLUSS'S DAH TODEMZ, SO SURVIVRZ DNT NEED N E FING ELZ
I get that there are survivor mains with 10K hours, but holy shit, why is the game balanced around FIVE twitch streamers? 
Ubisoft coddled Widdz like that in Div 2, and he effe'd off to go play CSGO or something, but not before he whined and cried about Foundry Bullwark until the devs ruined it
Now look at Div 2. JUST. LOOK.
I get that there's a lot of moving parts in making a game. I promise, I do. 
It might not even be the devs, so much as the managers that are responsible for the issues. 
I'mma end it here, I'm so angry I just uninstalled (NB4 'git guud') I put in 350 hours and I'm STILL as shit as the day I started. 
I've literally had extremely violent revenge porn fantasies about the managers or whoever is behind the problems.

Error 8012 boots people out of their matches right after buying their new DLC. Still toxic and survivor sided by a LONG shot. Still no change to the meta besides Gen rush and Tunnel/camp. VHS does it better. So far, no error 8012 booting me out of matches and keeping me from reconnecting in that asymmetrical horror game...

Edited for grammar and to add issues with their server. You can hit the survivors (They even make the sound confirming that you hit them) and it will still refuse to give them damage. Being hit with a pallet is the same way. I have walked several steps from a pallet, survivor panics and drops with me already gone, and somehow i still get stunned. This has happened multiple times. If you have a fast internet connection (For America) it may work against you as the "server side" that determines hits seems to side with the slower provider.

"Nominate us for labor of love" Meanwhile deadhard still doesnt work after they "Fixed" it. They blatantly lie about what they fix and then fix it later when they think everyone forgot about them lying about it to begin with. (Yes behaivor we remember you lying about pinheads chains multiple times before you actually fixed it less than a week ago) I play both killer and survivor and playing killer is basically putting the game on easy mode and playing survivor you can expect 3/4 of your skills not to function correctly and the killer to hit you from across the stage. And dont worry cause if they do miss the first time, they can just bloodlust (something that hasnt been needed in the game for over a year and a half) you till they get you.  Honestly I dont understand how the devs can have their heads so far up their own asses and still cant seem to smell their own bullshit. everyone else smells it. But whats sad is that if the devs even had half a brain cell between the lot of them this could be a great game. its just unfortunate that its not in better hands. as it stands 2/10. "Nominate us for labor of love" pfft maybe put some labor or love in to your gam and then ask again. Yall are fucking foolish. EVERYONE SHOULD CHECK OUT VHS INSTEAD ITS GONNA BE 10x BETTER THAN THIS SHIT GAME CAUSE THE DEVS ALREADY SHOW THEY ACTUALLY CARE!

So, this game is pretty thoroughly amazing. 2 completely different games depending on if you pick killer or survivor. Though I enjoy seeing characters from movies or other branches of horror, the heart lies in the OC. Wonderfully maniacal killers galore with consistent additions and update making for a still fresh experience. There are really fun mechanics to learn in this game and I can tell you from experience that there is no better feeling than knowing the killers cant catch you if you invest into learning all of these mechanics. Now for the bad part. The loading time is insufferable. It's impossible to maintain momentum when you have such long gaps between games, Another bad thing, and this is REALLY bad, is the cheating. Theres more than you can imagine and the cheats used are just a shameless abuse of the game. I've reported my own team for crawling across the whole stage in dying state in about 2 seconds. Killers can remove their stain and terror radius and prevent you from dropping pallets and the worst part is that there seems to be no effort in prevention. All in all this game is amazing even with all things considered but be prepared to get annoyed sometimes
Fun Game in which you get to play as, or against your favorite horror characters.

Игра которую создали калеки не стоит ни рубля. Дизайн карт убогий, убийцы могут ударить тебя если ты стоишь за их спиной, баланса нет,хочешь скины или нового персонажа будь добр достать пару сотен из кашелька. К покупке не рекомендую пустая трата денег.

Вроде бы столько времени разработчики уделяют время игра. А баланса в игре никого. Ну ладно не можете вы из-за хороших коопераций или недостатко игроков нормальный баланс делать. Но зачем так высоко задирать прокачку  рангов в игре? При убийстве двух сурвов тебе даже +1 к рангу не дают. В итоге всеравно радужных сурвов в пати будет кидать даже к маннам серебрянного  ранга, и люди не будут стараться понимая что даже  минимальной прокачки им за это давать не будут. Или же просто маннов без скилов и предметов которые всё итак "видят" будет только больше. Прокачка итак сбрасывается, так какой смысл делать её настолько сложной.
P.S. Печально что люди сами иногда убивают процесс игры, держа двоих-троих лежачих и ища остальных.
